entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sydenham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 5:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -2
Dewpoint: -1.5°C
Wind: E 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
